statements: SELECT * FROM routing_information ORDER BY vehicle_name ASC, estimated_time_of_arrival DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, current_location, destination FROM routing_information WHERE route_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM routing_information WHERE current_location = 'Warehouse' AND destination = 'Airport';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM routing_information;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name, estimated_time_of_arrival FROM routing_information WHERE route_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY estimated_time_of_arrival ASC;
SELECT * FROM routing_information ORDER BY estimated_time_of_arrival DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, destination FROM routing_information WHERE route_id = 101 ORDER BY vehicle_name ASC;
SELECT current_location, destination FROM routing_information WHERE estimated_time_of_arrival < '2022-01-01' AND current_location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name, current_location FROM routing_information WHERE current_location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM routing_information WHERE destination = 'Customer B' AND current_location != destination ORDER BY estimated_time_of_arrival ASC;
SELECT * FROM fleet_vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_type, driver_name FROM fleet_vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, current_location FROM fleet_vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV';
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name, current_location FROM fleet_vehicles ORDER BY current_location DESC;
SELECT route_id, origin_location, destination_location, distance_miles FROM routing_information WHERE distance_miles > 100;
SELECT * FROM fleet_vehicles WHERE driver_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_type, current_location FROM fleet_vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Truck';
SELECT vehicle_name, driver_name FROM fleet_vehicles ORDER BY driver_name DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, current_location, driver_name FROM fleet_vehicles WHERE current_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT vehicle_name, current_location FROM fleet_vehicles WHERE current_location IS NULL ORDER BY vehicle_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM routing_information
SELECT current_location, destination FROM routing_information
SELECT vehicle_id, destination, estimated_time_of_arrival FROM routing_information WHERE vehicle_id = 1
SELECT * FROM vehicle_routes
SELECT route_id, route_details FROM vehicle_routes
SELECT * FROM routing_information ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT current_location, destination FROM routing_information WHERE estimated_time_of_arrival > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY current_location ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, route_details FROM vehicle_routes WHERE distance_covered > 100 ORDER BY vehicle_id, distance_covered DESC;

SELECT routing.current_location, vehicle_routes.route_details FROM routing_information routing INNER JOIN vehicle_routes ON routing.vehicle_id = vehicle_routes.vehicle_id WHERE routing.vehicle_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM optimization_logs WHERE optimization_details LIKE '%improvement%' ORDER BY execution_time;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_type, license_plate FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type='Car';
SELECT driver_name, driver_license FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_name DESC;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance_in_km FROM routes WHERE distance_in_km > 50 ORDER BY distance_in_km ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, start_time, end_time FROM schedules WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01' AND end_time <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car';
SELECT vehicle_name, license_plate FROM vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_name DESC;
SELECT vehicles.vehicle_name, drivers.driver_name FROM vehicles INNER JOIN drivers ON vehicles.driver_id = drivers.driver_id;
SELECT routes.start_location, routes.end_location, vehicles.vehicle_name FROM routes LEFT JOIN vehicles ON routes.vehicle_id = vehicles.id;
SELECT schedule_id, start_time, end_time FROM schedules WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM fleet_vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, make, model FROM fleet_vehicles WHERE year >= 2019;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM vehicle_routes ORDER BY start_location;
SELECT segment_id, distance FROM route_segments WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT optimization_id, status, optimization_date FROM route_optimization WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY optimization_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM fleet_vehicles WHERE vehicle_status = 'active';
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, MAX(vehicle_year) FROM fleet_vehicles GROUP BY vehicle_make, vehicle_model;
SELECT route_id, SUM(segment_distance) AS total_distance FROM route_segments GROUP BY route_id HAVING total_distance > 1000;
SELECT vehicle_id, route_id, optimization_date FROM route_optimization ORDER BY optimization_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT DISTINCT rh.route_id, rh.route_date, COUNT(rh.route_id) AS number_of_history_entries FROM routing_history rh JOIN route_segments rs ON rh.route_id = rs.route_id GROUP BY rh.route_id, rh.route_date ORDER BY number_of_history_entries DESC;
